title: Your job in 5 words
contentencoded:
We asked President Barack Obama to describe his job in five words or less.

He couldn't do it. But our listeners could. Here's what you do, in (give or take) five words:

 

And hey?

Don't like your job description? Let Marketplace generate one for you.

Job descriptions contributed by and

#JobIn5Words
